Package controller

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.Controller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CodeListener, java.io.Serializable

    public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
implements CodeListener, java.io.Serializable
    The Controller handles all interaction between the View and Model. It handles the timer of the game and updates both the Model and View constantly.
    Author:
    Miguel Fuentes, Devon Pirestani, Andre Green, Dylan Martin, W Mathieu Mimms-Boyce
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
